lingo-terminologypagename:
Name of the page where the terms and definitions of the glossary are stored
{{Identical|Terminology}}
lingo-noapprovedrevs: Used as warning message when the ApprovedRevs extension is not installed.
lingo-invalidlinktarget: Used as error message when the link target $2 is not a valid wiki page name.
lingo-element-linktext:
Used as link text for the tooltip element. Parameters:
* $1 - term name
